pokemon.name: Abra
pokemon.description: Sleeps 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.

pokemon.name: Aerodactyl
pokemon.description: This vicious Pokemon is said to have flown in ancient skies while shrieking high-pitched cries.

pokemon.name: Alakazam
pokemon.description: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

pokemon.name: Arbok
pokemon.description: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.description: This legendary Chinese Pokemon is considered magnificent. Many people are enchanted by its grand mane.

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.description: A legendary bird Pokemon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

pokemon.name: Bellsprout
pokemon.description: A carnivorous Pokemon that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.description: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.

pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokemon.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokemon.name: Caterpie
pokemon.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.description: Being few in number and difficult to capture, it is said to bring happiness to the Trainer who catches it.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

pokemon.name: Clefable
pokemon.description: With its acute hearing, it can pick up sounds from far away. It usually hides in quiet places.

pokemon.name: Clefairy
pokemon.description: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.

pokemon.name: Cloyster
pokemon.description: Even a missile can't break the spikes it uses to stab opponents. They're even harder than its shell.

pokemon.name: Cubone
pokemon.description: Tal's favorite Pokemon! Cubone's both cute and completely hardcore.

pokemon.name: Dewgong
pokemon.description: Its entire body is a snowy-white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.description: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

pokemon.name: Ditto
pokemon.description: Duncan's favorite Pokemon (he has an awesome painting of Ditto on his wall). It can transform into anything. When it sleeps, it changes into a stone to avoid being attacked.

pokemon.name: Dodrio
pokemon.description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

pokemon.name: Doduo
pokemon.description: It races through grassy plains with powerful strides, leaving footprints up to four inches deep.

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.description: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.description: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.description: Long considered a mythical Pokemon until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.description: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

pokemon.name: Dugtrio
pokemon.description: A team of triplets that can burrow over 60 MPH. Due to this, some people think it's an earthquake.

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.description: Sven's favorite Pokemon! Due to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokemon conceals many different possible evolutions.

pokemon.name: Ekans
pokemon.description: It always hides in grass. When first born, it has no poison, so its bite is painful, but harmless.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.description: Electricity runs across the surface of its body. In darkness, its entire body glows a whitish-blue.

pokemon.name: Electrode
pokemon.description: It is dangerous. If it has too much electricity and has nothing to do, it amuses itself by exploding.

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
pokemon.description: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

pokemon.name: Exeggutor
pokemon.description: Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the 3 heads thinks about whatever it likes.

pokemon.name: Farfetch'd
pokemon.description: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

pokemon.name: Fearow
pokemon.description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.description: It fluffs out its fur collar to cool down its body temperature, which can reach 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.description: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.description: Chadi's favorite Pokemon! It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.description: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.description: Smells incredibly foul! However, around 1 out of 1,000 people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.description: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.

pokemon.name: Goldeen
pokemon.description: A strong swimmer, it is capable of swimming nonstop up fast streams at a steady speed of five knots.

pokemon.name: Golduck
pokemon.description: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

pokemon.name: Golem
pokemon.description: It is enclosed in a hard shell that is as rugged as slabs of rock. It sheds skin once a year to grow larger.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.description: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.description: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

pokemon.name: Growlithe
pokemon.description: Conner's favorite Pokemon ('It's adorable'). It has a brave and trustworthy nature and fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.description: It appears whenever there is world conflict, burning down any place it travels through.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.description: It hides in the dark, planning to take the life of the next living thing that wanders close by.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.description: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.description: It maintains balance using its tail, which is wound up like a coil. It may spray ink from its mouth.

pokemon.name: Hypno
pokemon.description: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.description: Garrett's favorite Pokemon! When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.description: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.description: It has several different cry patterns, each of which seems to have its own meaning.

pokemon.name: Kabuto
pokemon.description: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.

pokemon.name: Kabutops
pokemon.description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

pokemon.name: Kadabra
pokemon.description: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

pokemon.name: Kakuna
pokemon.description: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

pokemon.name: Kangaskhan
pokemon.description: To protect its young, it will never give up during battle, no matter how badly wounded it is.

pokemon.name: Kingler
pokemon.description: It can hardly lift its massive, overgrown pincer. The pincer's size makes it difficult to aim properly.

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.description: If one gets close enough to it when it expels poisonous gas, the gas swirling inside it can be seen.

pokemon.name: Krabby
pokemon.description: Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.description: Nicole's favorite Pokemon! Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.description: Its tongue spans almost 7 feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.

pokemon.name: Machamp
pokemon.description: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.description: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.description: A pathetic excuse for a Pokemon that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.description: The fiery surface of its body gives off a wavering, rippling glare that is similar to the sun.

pokemon.name: Magnemite
pokemon.description: The electricity emitted by the units on each side of its body cause it to become a strong magnet.

pokemon.name: Magneton
pokemon.description: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6F degrees within 3,300 feet.

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

pokemon.name: Marowak
pokemon.description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.description: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

pokemon.name: Metapod
pokemon.description: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

pokemon.name: Mew
pokemon.description: Its DNA is said to contain the genetic codes of all Pokemon.

pokemon.name: Mewtwo
pokemon.description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.description: This legendary Pokemon scatters embers with every flap of its wings. It is a thrilling sight to behold.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.description: Always practices its pantomime act. It makes enemies believe something exists that really doesn't.

pokemon.name: Muk
pokemon.description: As it moves, a very strong poison leaks from it, making the ground there barren for three years.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.description: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.description: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

pokemon.name: Nidoran(F)
pokemon.description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokemon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

pokemon.name: Nidoran(M)
pokemon.description: It stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

pokemon.name: Nidorina
pokemon.description: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.

pokemon.name: Nidorino
pokemon.description: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.

pokemon.name: Ninetales
pokemon.description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.description: It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds. If you try to yank it out of the ground, it shrieks horribly.

pokemon.name: Omanyte
pokemon.description: Revived from an ancient fossil, this Pokemon uses air stored in its shell to sink and rise in water.

pokemon.name: Omastar
pokemon.description: Apparently, it cracked Shellder's shell with its sharp fangs and sucked out the insides.

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.description: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

pokemon.name: Paras
pokemon.description: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host Paras.

pokemon.name: Parasect
pokemon.description: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

pokemon.name: Persian
pokemon.description: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.description: It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.description: It has outstanding vision. However high it flies, it is able to distinguish the movements of its prey.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.description: Jeffrey's favorite Pokemon! Because it dislikes fighting, it protects itself by kicking up sand.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.description: Melissa's favorite Pokemon! When several Pikachu gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

pokemon.name: Pinsir
pokemon.description: When the temperature drops at night, it sleeps on treetops or among roots where it is well hidden.

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.description: Its two legs are well developed. Even though it can live on the ground, it prefers living in water.

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.description: Although an energetic, skilled swimmer that uses all of its muscles, it lives on dry land.

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.description: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes. Not to be confused with the 20% cooler PonyTA.

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.description: A manmade Pokemon that came about as a result of research. It is programmed with only basic motions.

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.description: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.description: Very competitive, this Pokemon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

pokemon.name: Raticate
pokemon.description: Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop growing, so it gnaws to pare them down.

pokemon.name: Rattata
pokemon.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.description: It doesn't care if there is anything in its way. It just charges and destroys all obstacles.

pokemon.name: Sandshrew
pokemon.description: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.

pokemon.name: Sandslash
pokemon.description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.description: Its blindingly fast speed adds to the sharpness of its twin forearm scythes which can slice through thick logs in one wicked stroke.

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.description: Capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

pokemon.name: Seaking
pokemon.description: The horn on its head is sharp like a drill. It bores a hole in a boulder to make its nest.

pokemon.name: Seel
pokemon.description: The light blue fur that covers it keeps it protected against the cold. It loves iceberg-filled oceans.

pokemon.name: Shellder
pokemon.description: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.

pokemon.name: Slowbro
pokemon.description: An attached Shellder won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.description: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

pokemon.name: Spearow
pokemon.description: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.description: Whitaker's favorite Pokemon! After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

pokemon.name: Starmie
pokemon.description: The center section is named the core. People think it is communicating when it glows in 7 colors.

pokemon.name: Staryu
pokemon.description: An enigmatic Pokemon that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.description: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.description: They fight each other by locking horns. The herd's protector takes pride in its battle-scarred horns.

pokemon.name: Tentacool
pokemon.description: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

pokemon.name: Tentacruel
pokemon.description: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.description: As it uses the fins on the tip of its tail to swim, it blends with the water perfectly.

pokemon.name: Venomoth
pokemon.description: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

pokemon.name: Venonat
pokemon.description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

pokemon.name: Victreebel
pokemon.description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.description: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.description: It was discovered when Poke balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.

pokemon.name: Vulpix
pokemon.description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.description: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.description: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.

pokemon.name: Weepinbell
pokemon.description: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acids.

pokemon.name: Weezing
pokemon.description: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small Koffing twins becoming conjoined as a Weezing.

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.description: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.description: A legendary Pokmon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
